name: Blacktrace Ltd
overview:
Blacktrace is committed to helping our clients achieve business success. Our mission is to create business success for our company, our clients and our partners by developing and manufacturing elegant solutions in technology.

At blacktrace, we have a straightforward philosophy – technology should be simple to use. We add value by reducing complexity. The blacktrace team believe that form and function are not in opposition, and only by combining their synergies can elegance be created.

We are experts in taking science and fusing it with engineering to create market-leading products. From novel instruments for enhancing protein crystallisation, to control and logging of industrial greenhouses, we can bring our wealth of experience to provide a solution which is far more than just another grey box.

To demonstrate our own confidence in our capabilities, we don’t just design for others we create market-leading products of our own. As well as a wide range of pharmaceutical productivity tools, we have particular expertise in micro-engineering and microfluidic solutions which are brought to market through our Dolomite brand.
